title: Wiggle begins self-administration, Cycling Electric reports
content:
Cyclist
Wiggle begins self-administration, Cycling Electric reports

WiggleCRC, which consists of online sports retail giants Wiggle and Chain Reaction Cycles, has begun the self-administration process, industry sources have told Cyclistâ€™s sister publication Cycling Electric.

Following the withdrawal of funds from parent group Signa Sports United in the last few days, the future of the British company is now in doubt and a restructuring assessment is underway.

For the full story and what it means, head to cyclingelectric.com.

The post Wiggle begins self-administration, Cycling Electric reports appeared first on Cyclist.
author: Will Strickson | Deputy Website Editor
